titles.title: Don't You Know It's Time To Praise The Lord

properties.copyright: 1981 Maranatha! Music / CCCM Music, Administered by Maranatha! Music

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Don't you know it's time
To praise the Lord
In the sanctuary of His Holy Spirit
So set your mind on Him

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
And let your praise begin
And the glory of the Lord
Will fill this place
Praise the Lord
(Sisters echo)
praise the Lord
(Sisters echo)
Praise the Lord)

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He lives within
The praises of His people
He loves to hear us
Call upon His name
So set your mind on Him

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
And let your praise begin
And the glory of the Lord
Will fill this place
Praise the Lord praise the Lord
